Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Hey people! Are you ready for some breaking news? Major companies in Australia are stepping up their game to promote Covid-19 vaccinations to their employees amid what's expected to be the worst flu season in a decade. But wait, there's more! Aussie workers might be facing a sneaky $1500 "tax increase by stealth" soon, causing alarm among the masses. However, concerns are already being raised about the potential drug shortages due to the proposed changes to prescribing and dispensing rules. Also, be warned: if you have a mortgage, brace yourself for record-high repayments in the future, as the Reserve Bank of Australia doesn't rule out further rate hikes. Stay tuned for updates on these hot topics!
